payload.title: Design generic RecordStore<T> architecture
payload.description: Design and implement a generic RecordStore<T> that can handle any GitGovernance Record type with type safety. Replace specialized stores (ActorStore, TaskStore) with a single, reusable pattern using TypeScript generics and proper constraints.
payload.notes: This was the most transformational decision of the session. The generic approach eliminated massive code duplication and provided a single, type-safe pattern for all Record persistence.
